channel.title: BUpolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUpolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Judge strikes down Trump order punishing law firm Perkins Coie
item.description: President Donald Trump has targeted several law firms with penalties, four of which sued to challenge his actions.

item.title: Trump wants to rename Veterans Day to focus on military victories
item.description: The late-night Truth Social post was not accompanied by an executive order, and only Congress has the authority to create or change a federal holiday.

item.title: Here’s what Trump’s budget proposal cuts by agency
item.description: Here’s how the Trump administration’s 2026 budget request looks for key agencies.

item.title: Asked if a recession is on the horizon, Trump says: ‘Anything can happen’
White House launches unusual looped video — to stream for days — touting accomplishments
item.description: The video caps a week of media events on a range of platforms the Trump administration used to amplify the president’s actions and mark the first 100 ...

item.title: Democrats look to Trump's poor economic numbers with anxious optimism
item.description: Following its latest round of focus groups, Navigator Research is urging Democrats to proactively push their own economic policies.

item.title: German Court Allows Asylum Seekers to be Deported to Safe Countries

item.description: Willful blindness has been a strategy for many states when it comes to the costs of illegal immigration. Last year, Florida opted to take the blinders...

item.title: Warning signs for Trump as pessimistic outlook on the economy grows among Americans
item.description: Trump’s winning issue is becoming one of his biggest liabilities as multiple polls this week reveal growing disapproval numbers on the economy.

item.title: Trump, defiant on tariffs, claims trade deals are in the works
item.description: The president is foreshadowing deals with multiple trading partners in an apparent effort to quell economic anxiety and prove his tariff plan is worki...

item.title: US markets have spiraled. Americans had doubts about Trump’s tariffs before that.
item.description: Recent polls showed Americans were wary of tariffs, even before the president launched his plan to realign the global trade order.

item.title: Trump says tariff policies ‘WILL NEVER CHANGE’ amid plunging stocks, Chinese response
item.description: The president’s sweeping tariff plan has thrown markets into chaos and risks sparking a global trade war.

item.title: What to Know About China's DeepSeek AI
item.description: The Chinese upstart says it has trained high-performing AI models cheaply, without using the most advanced chips.

item.description: DeepSeek is called “amazing and impressive” despite working with less-advanced chips.

item.title: Tech, Media & Telecom Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: DeepSeek, SoFi and more in the latest Market Talks covering Technology, Media and Telecom.

item.title: Reid Hoffman Raises $24.6 Million for AI Cancer-Research Startup
item.description: The LinkedIn co-founder is starting Manas AI with “The Emperor of All Maladies” author Siddhartha Mukherjee.

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
